column5: I was on earlier and set my theme to mobile. Just came back, didn't log out, and I still have to manually reset it to mobile. Its driving me nuts. A lot of times I just close it up if its the wrong theme.  What's up with that??  S.
Anyone else have this theme issue? Its driving me nuts!! EVERY time I come to OFC I have to manually reset the theme. What am I doing wrong???  S.
Over the past 2 weeks, with increasing frequency, have been getting "404 webpage not found" messages when opening some of the topics in general discussion. Newest is Lew's mini rant.
I havent noticed any 404 issues... anyone????
Nope
All fine on my pc and iPhone.  Never received the page not found error.
You got trouble. Last time I had that,it was new pc time. Huge virus.
Nope - nothing down here.
Nope, runs fine on the iphone and mac
sorry bud, fine here too. I used to get that...the problem was my computer...viruses
Nope, but if someone was having problems they would likely not be able to tell us here either.
Alls fine here, did see some 404s previous to the last updates, but none since
All fine here as well.  You might want to clear your Internet cache and\or try a different browser.  Wouldn't hurt to run a virus\malware check either.
Jeez, I hope my mini rant didn't bust OFC

BigUgli, you can probably blame your ISP's DNS servers for the 404 errors.  I know that I was having issues with Rogers a few weeks back.  If you know how, add the Google DNS servers to your routers Primary and Secondary DNS lookup list.  DNS #1 8.8.8.8 DNS #2 8.8.4.4
I'm still having theme issues. I have to manually change it everrytime I log in. I'm primarily on mobile, but I have to manually change it each time.  S.
I have from time to time- figured it was just my junk computer ?
All is clean at this end.
I have 404 issues every morning at about 8:45 and evening at 5:30... those stopped when I started to take don mills instead.
Been smooth sailing here for a long while.
All is well at this border crossing.
Computer's clean, just had it in and upgraded my AV, the glich only happens here @ OFC. We'll see what clearing the cookies does.
fine and dandy from my corner of the world. desktop and mobile.

Only issue I have is when I click on a thread and  when I go back to general discussion it always goes to the top of the page instead of back to where I clicked on the post and OFC page is slow comming up on my screen.
I don't usually have a problem.
No issues here
